mapper.select: select m.id 'meetingId', m.name 'meetingName', m.mexplain 'mexplain', m.date 'meetingDate', mm.id 'mmId', mm.memberId 'memberId', mm.type 'memberType', mm.date 'memberDate' from meeting m left join meetingmember mm on m.id = mm.meetingId where mm.type=3 and mm.memberId = #{userId}

select m.id meetingId, m.name meetingName, m.mexplain meetingExplain, m.date meetingDate, u.name userName, mm.type mmType, mm.date mmDate from meeting m left join meetingMember mm on m.id = mm.meetingId join user u on mm.memberId = u.id where mm.memberId = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT User (studentNumber, name, nickname, password, departmentId, question, answer, type, gender) VALUES (#{studentNumber}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{departmentId}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{type}, #{gender})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET studentNumber = #{studentNumber}, name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, password = #{password}, departmentId = #{departmentId}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, type = #{type}, gender = #{gender}
UPDATE User SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickname}, departmentId = #{departmentId}, question = #{question}, answer = #{answer}, gender = #{gender} WHERE studentNumber = #{studentNumber}
